GraphicsLab

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • GraphicsLab.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the concept of a 3D vertex
    Author:
    Anthony Jones and Dan Cornford
